forecast.day_comments: Rain, possibly mixed with snow.  High near 39. South southwest wind 11 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no snow accumulation expected.
forecast.night_comments: Rain and snow, becoming all snow after 1am.  Low around 32. Southwest wind around 8 mph becoming northwest after midnight.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

OneDay.skies: Snow and Rain. Snow and Rain

forecast.day_comments: Snow, possibly mixed with rain.  Steady temperature around 36. Southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A chance of rain and snow, mainly before midnight.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. West southwest wind 6 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 50%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
